entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A dotnet.generated.invalid node shows up in the browser dev tools when running a .NET 8 Preview 3 Blazor WebAssembly app #84950
  • Linux musl x64 build break apparently due to some libc version mismatch (high priority as it is blocking clean CI) #84949
  • [API Proposal]: Add GetElapsedTime(long) #84945
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Environment.GetCommandLineArgs() throws nullref exception #84944
  • XUnit log fixer creates invalid XML when fixing the xml after a timed out test #84940
  • Make dependency on lld optional during runtime build #84934
  • Remove Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel 6.0.0 pre-build dependency #84925
    8.0.0
  • TE startup/time-to-first-request regression #84923
  • 3.6 MB size regression updating System.Text.Json to 8.0.0 #84922
  • ContainsGenericParameters not reported for function pointer types #84916
  • Test failure Interop\\NativeLibrary\\API\\NativeLibraryTests\\NativeLibraryTests.cmd #84914
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow #84913
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\Vectorization\\UnrollEqualsStartsWIth\\UnrollEqualsStartsWIth.cmd #84912
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #84911
  • AV in ComWrappers.ComInterfaceDispatch.GetInstance<T> on NativeAOT during second lookup #84908
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Degraded performance in metering when creating a lot of instruments #84713
    8.0.0
  • Plugin method is ignored without exception if method signature changed #84836
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0046\\istype\\istype.cmd #79263
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0044\\nullable\\nullable.cmd #78083
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\22728\\debug15\\debug15.cmd #77251
  • Test failure TypeGeneratorTests1200-1299 #81112
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\suppressfinalize\\suppressfinalize.cmd #77820
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_22348\\Test22348\\Test22348.cmd #81120
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/xxobj/sizeof/sizeof64_Target_64Bit_and_arm_il_r/sizeof64_Target_64Bit_and_arm.cmd #81109
    8.0.0
  • How to implement an Ipv4 and Ipv6 Socket connection? #84893
  • Build test machine images step fails in CI #35507
    Future
  • System.Text.Json fails to build on .NET Native due to unconstrained raw pointer uses #84895

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable TLS field access for Arm #84954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Environment.GetCommandLineArg for AOT compiled libraries #84953
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix R2R test build #84952
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_STORE_OBJ` #84951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix unrollings on AVX1-only machines #84946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Lowering Vector512() methods : comparison + shift #84942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Acclerate `Vector512` multiply and divide. #84941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Avx512: Abs, ceil, floor, min, max #84937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport #78136 to .NET 7 #84936
    Servicing-consider, tenet-performance, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator, 7.0.x
  • Don't contain operands for intrinsics when generating a jmp table fallback #84933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Accelerate Vector512 `ConvertToSingle` and `ConvertToInt32`. #84932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.GetElement as intrinsic in arm64. #84929
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix for incorrect release of CCW holder #84927
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Restructure WellKnownOids.cs #84921
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, size-reduction
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` checking for prefix/suffix #84920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix instuctions for nativeaot build #84919
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    needs-area-label
  • Expose AVX512 variants of SSE-SSE4.2 instructions #84909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512

Merged

  • Reconfigure the HWIntrinsic tests to run more selectively #84948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix aarch64+clang compilation errors #84947
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add issues.targets entries for four tests failing on Windows arm #84943
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Re-enable gc-sections with lld for NativeAOT #84935
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Move mono.mscordbi subset off the offical build #84939
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Deduplicate Binary Integer parsing logic #84582
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0] Move mono.mscordbi subset off the offical build #84938
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix JIT use of BitScan* APIs #84915
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nativeaot libraries test cross-build #84870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Integrate compression from StaticWebAssets #84924
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable AVX-512 for string/span Equals/StartsWith #84885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine `cmp` and shift ops into a single `cmp` op #84605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add extending integer arithmetic #84687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Complex #84779
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Dot as intrinsic for arm64. #84245
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Narrow,Widen as intrinsics on arm64. #84837
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve SequenceEqual for constant lengths unrolling #84524
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix JitDisasmWithAlignmentBoundaries #84827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [main] Upload buildlogs with an _Attempt suffix #83826
  • [RISC-V] Fix build error #84910
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Baseline two systemic failures in the CoreCLR outerloop pipeline #84904
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Generate SslConnectionInfo.Unix.cs with T4 template #84690
    area-System.Net.Security, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Revert use of raw pointers in System.Text.Json (#78741)" #84899
    area-System.Text.Json

Updated

  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Don't re-instrument methods which don't need that #84772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Add a dedicated Ascii.IsValid path #84881
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM32/ARM64 - Fixed zero/sign-extension for `GT_STORE_LCL_VAR` in codegen #84716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend PreInitialization Support to readonly GC fields #84431
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #84611
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Updating XML doc comments for hardware intrinsics to include VEX and EVEX forms #84892
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, arch-avx512
  • Adjust managed type system for new function pointer handling #84819
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #84735
    area-Interop-mono
  • restore the upper vector at the use of GT_FIELD_LIST #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Attempt to fix #84636 #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrade arm64 cross image to Ubuntu 22.04 / llvm-15 #83939
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Address a couple `TODO-ADDR`s #84906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Minimal blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0-staging] Tar: Add missing TarFile.CreateFromDirectoryAsync roundtrip tests #84856
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Publish Aggregated Values For `Counter` and `UpDownCounter` For System.Diagnostics.Metrics #84846
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Disallow `BLK<SIMD>` #84868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add binary support to number formatting #84889
    area-System.Runtime
  • Use net6.0 SqlClient TFM under source-build #84782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • WIP: Optimize `ComputeLastIndex` #83441
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #84886
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` SortKey #84621
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [RISC-V][GC] Use 128gb for regions_range on RISCV64 #84797
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84873
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84874
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable event pipe test in NativeAOT CI run #84891
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Disable corelib crossgen2 #84781
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862

    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
